plot: After being forced to resign from the ARC by Philip, Connor visits his old friend Duncan who has become obsessed with creature sightings since Tom's death. The pair investigate a dangerous creature on the loose at the docks.

When Connor looks up old friends Duncan, he doesn't expect to find him obsessed with creature sightings. Warning him of the elusive dock creature, the pair track it down to the docks, only to find evidence of a fresh kill. With Abby and Matt arriving to help, they find the creature after a tense chase through a container yard. Will Connor's quick-thinking and bravery earn him back his place on the team?—Anonymous

Sir James reluctantly implements Burton's dismissal of Abby and Connor as they do not have the military background required of new ARC personnel,though Abby stays on as menagerie curatrix. Connor tracks down geeky pal Duncan,who is doing his own research into anomalies,locating a huge carnivorous lizard which has been living in the sewers for five years and is now at large in the docklands.The beast is killed,due to the efforts of Abby and Connor,who are officially reinstated,and move in with Jess.—don @ minifie-1
